job.title: Quality Assurance Engineer
job.description: ustrongWhen joining Elevations you can expect to work for a company thatbrstronguul liHas been in business serving the local community since 1953li liIs a twotime Malcolm Baldridge National Quality Award winner the only presidential award for performance excellenceli liHas been voted as the Best Bank by our members and community and Best Companies to Work for in Colorado by our employeesli liPromotes a safe and inclusive environment where people express themselves openly and have opportunities to growli liRecognizes and rewards people who make every person feel welcomed valued respected and heardli liHas a highlyengaged workforce committed to innovation continuous improvement and collaborationli liUnderstands when our employees thrive our members and community thrive tooli liIs dedicated to consistently providing amazing experiences and creating raving fansli brbrulstronguWhats In It For Youbrustrongul liA leadership team that strives to make this the best place youve ever workedli liAmple opportunity to learn develop and grow We offer access to LinkedIn Learning career and leadership development programs job shadowing a mentor program and tuition reimbursementli liA highlycompetitive total rewards package with 4 weeks paid time off work anniversary paid time off and 11 paid holidaysli liSupport in giving back to our community with 16 hours of paid volunteer time offli liA wellnessfocused environment that encourages and empowers you to invest in your worklife balance health and wellbeingli liA strong Employee Assistance Program offering a variety of personal and professional resourcesli liA highperformance culture where you can be proud of your contributions and what we are able to achieve as a teamli liA place where your voice can be heard and your work will have an impactli ul strong SummaryObjective brstrongElevations is in the process of taking the foundation of its software development practice to the next level We are looking for an individual with a passion for best practices across the QA and Agile and a strong passion for delivering quality productsbrbrThe QA Engineer will be part of a growing QA organization This position will be responsible for the design development and execution of test cases to ensure software products meet business needs You will be responsible for catching bugs through manual testing processes You will work closely with our Business Product Managers and Developers to ensure that all code developed is properly testedbrbrstronguEssential Functions Includebrustrongul li Participate in review sessions of business requirements technical requirements and design documents to ensure the software changes are understood li li Coordinate with multiple business stakeholders to develop and ensure end to end test coverage li li Develop and manually execute test cases based on requirements li li Provide continuous updates on the state of testing and risk factors to schedules li li Work closely with other team members in the development execution and tracking of corrective action plans that drive improved compliance continuous improvement increased performance and efficiencies li li Communicate effectively with both technical and nontechnical colleagues at all levels in both verbal and written communications li li Contributes technical knowledge and understanding to training programs support processes and operating procedures li ul strong Reports to brstrongIT QA ManagerbrbrstronguManagesbrbrustrongThis role does not have supervisory responsibilitybrbrstronguRequired CompetenciesbrbrustrongDecision Making Quality Orientation Planning and Organizing Continuous Improvement Influencing Building NetworksbrbrstronguRequired Education And Experiencebrustrongul li BS in Computer Science Information Systems Engineering or equivalent li li 36 years of similar or related experience li li Understanding of agile development processes li li Ability to effectively use troubleshooting and technical skills li li Intellectually curious amp analytically minded li li Ability to clearly communicate about software defects including steps to reproduce li li Ability to work independently as well as in teams li ul strong Preferred Education and Experience brstrongul li Preferred field of study Computer Science or related field li li Developing automated test scripts with Selenium or related automation tool li li Experience with Python or Java li li Prefer knowledge of and experience with client and server side JavaScript Azure or AWS cloud vendors Linux and relational databases li li Prefer knowledge of and experience with IBMs AIX operating system Jack Henry amp Associates Symitar division products including Episys and related PowerOn development li ul strong Work Environment brstrongElevations uses multifactor authentication to keep our data safe As such a personal smart phone is a requirement for employment with us This job operates in an office setting and routinely uses standard office equipmentbrbrstronguPhysical RequirementsbrbrustrongSitting frequently walking occasionally use of hands frequently hearing constantly talking frequently exerting up to 10 lbs of force occasionally to lift carry push pull or move objectsbrbrstronguPosition TypeExpected Hours Of WorkbrbrustrongFull time  40 hours per weekbrbrstronguClassificationbrbrustrongExemptbrstrong Location brstrongElevations Basecamp Location 1 Environmental Way Broomfield CO 80021brbrstronguCompensationbrbrustrongThe minimum point of the budgeted range is 91040  an annual incentive The candidates starting salary will be adjusted based upon his her or their experiencebrbrstronguOther DutiesbrbrustrongPlease note this job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job Duties responsibilities and activities may change at any time with or without noticebrbrstronguAbout Usustrong Elevations Credit Union is a memberowned notforprofit financial institution serving Colorados Front Range Founded in 1953 weve grown from 12 members and less than 100 in assets to an institution with 13 branches and more than 120000 members that manages over 2 billion in assets and is the No 1 credit union mortgage lender in Colorado At Elevations weve made a commitment to move away from a productcentered business model and focus instead on creating consumer solutions Our objective is to provide our members as well as the entire community with unbiased consumer informationbrbrstronguEEO Statementu strongElevations Credit Union is an equal opportunity employer We do not discriminate on the basis of race color religion marital status age national origin ancestry physical or mental disability medical condition pregnancy genetic information gender sexual orientation gender identity or expression veteran status or any other status protected under federal state or local law All aspects of employment including the decision to hire promote discipline or discharge will be based on merit competence performance and business needsbrbrCandidates for certain positions may be required to submit to a credit history report in determining qualification for employment with Elevations Credit Union If the position you are applying for requires a credit history report any information received in such a report will not be the sole factor in making an employment decision A history of personal financial irresponsibility may be reason for disqualification insofar as it relates to your potential job duties Elevations Credit Union is aware that occasionally there are extenuating circumstances that may affect an individuals credit history We comply with the Fair Credit Reporting Act and the Colorado Employment Opportunity Act
